name: Super Space-Stronaut (mitchelb23)
description:
When I finalize this game I plan to make these three big modifications.

1) I Plan to make a second level that has 2 checkpoints before you finish with multiple doors and keys with enemies in the way.

2.) I plan to make a level 3 final level with a boss battle kind of like at the end of super Mario brothers games where you walk in and the goal is tyo beat one large enemy with his serevent enemies as well.

3.) I plan on editing an enemy into a boss level enemy through making him more difficult with possible other abilities to make him more challenging.

Credit; Mitchel Brown
